title: T207 w/ brown back PRICE CUT
author: caramelcard

posts.post_title: T207 w/ brown back PRICE CUT
posts.post_content:
Don't have much to go on to compare for setting a price.  One sold in higher grade in Mastro (over 2k) a couple of years ago but I can't find another sale.

Let me know if you'd like to trade or make a cash offer on this card.  I'm looking for around $750. lowered to $400  SOLD

Here's a link to the scans:  [url]http://imageevent.com/caramelcard/t206hofersforsale[/url]

Thanks.

Rob

Looks like I'm off quite a bit on the price on this one.

Lowered to SOLD  If it doesn't sell at this price, I'll stop bugging net 54 with this card.

Let me know if you're interested.

Thanks.

Robert

Robert,

I'll take it.
Please send payment details.

Hank
henryjlevy@yahoo.com
